query:
SELECT i.id as ingredient_id, i.name, i.unit, i.cost_per_unit, r.id as restaurant_id 
FROM ingredients i 
CROSS JOIN restaurants r 
WHERE i.name = 'Test Shrimp' 
LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute SELECT i.id as ingredient_id, i.name, i.unit, i.cost_per_unit, r.id as restaurant_id 
FROM ingredients i 
CROSS JOIN restaurants r 
WHERE i.name = 'Test Shrimp' 
LIMIT 1;
